name: Pong - Remastered
description:
In Single Player race up to 10 points against an AI!

In Co-op compete against your friend to see who comes out first with 10 points!

P1 Controls - W and S

P2 Controls - Up arrow key and Down arrow key 

Tools Used:

  • Unity (2020)
  • Visual Studio Code
  • Audacity
  • Krita
  • BFXR

This is a short little game with my take on the retro game Pong.

If the ball gets stuck or slows down press R to reset the ball If you notice any bugs please notify me in the comments
